package.name: FrontendFlush
package.summary: Really flush your JavaScript and CSS merged files.
package.description:
This module makes sure that the flush JavaScript CSS action creates a file with a unique name if the content of your Javascript or CSS files has changed.
By default Magento only does this if one of the file names has changed.
package.notes: Base functionality: * Create merged css file name based on css file contents * Create merged js file name based on js file content
